notes.text: Demokit 2.0: Tools landing page added
Form: visualize disply mode for Labels
PlanningCalendar-accessibility for special dates & appointments
m.DateRangeSelection: Support for DateInterval binding
sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: New breadcrumbs aggregation added
sap.m.Breadcrumbs: New interface added
sap.m.CheckBox: useEntireWidth property introduced
sap.m.Dialog: Positioned correctly, when stretch is set
sap.m.IOverflowToolbarContent interface introduced
sap.m.MessagePage: new iconAlt property added
sap.m.MessageView: A property for hiding header of details page has been added
sap.m.MessageView: no filter when not needed
sap.m.OverflowToolbarToggleButton: New control introduced
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Week numbers are now displayed
sap.m.QuickView: Header under condition is not shown anymore
sap.m.RatingIndicator: editable property is added
sap.m.SegmentedButton: new selectionChange event and new selectedItem association added
sap.m.Select: Improved touch support
sap.m.SemanticPage: Added backgroundDesign property.
sap.m.Table: Added aria-label to select all checkbox
sap.m.Table: alternateRowColors property added
sap.m.Table: popinLayout property added
sap.m.Text: New property for preserving white spaces added.
sap.m.Title: New Wrapping Property
sap.m.Toolbar: Added CSS class enforcing certain height in compact mode
sap.m: Change handler for add OData properties to sap.m.Table
(Potentially) missing documentation for managed property is fixed.
(Potentially) missing documentation for managed property is fixed.
ListBase: Update accessibility texts for deletable/selectable items
ShellHeader Layout fixed
TablePersoDialog / TablePersoController: Provide stable IDs
hover state for disabled button in transparent toolbar fixed
sap.m.ActionSheet: Improved accessibillity speech output in IE
sap.m.BarInPageEnabler: Bars no longer care about the context they're used in (i.e. header, footer, etc.)
sap.m.Button: Hover on button inside transparent toolbar is now corrected for IE11
sap.m.Button: Press event fired twice after UI adaptation
sap.m.Carousel: Losing focus on combi devices is now fixed
sap.m.ComboBox: Change event is now fired when highlighted item is clicked
sap.m.ComboBox: Fix highlighting in words with special characters
sap.m.DateTimePicker: qUnit fix
sap.m.Dialog: Stretch is now working correctly on desktop
sap.m.Dialog: Stretch property no mobile is now visualizing correct
sap.m.Dialog: color of icon is now correct
sap.m.FacetFilter - font size on filter details page is consistent with other lists.
sap.m.FacetFilter: Does not log error on combi device and type Light
sap.m.FacetFilter: Properly update selectedKeys cache when model changes
sap.m.FacetFilter: Update on a model remembers selection properly
sap.m.FacetFilterList: keep selection when growing occurs.
sap.m.FeedContent: Documentation issues solved
sap.m.FeedListItem: Improved the removal of empty HTML tags
sap.m.FeedListItem: Text collapsing corrected
sap.m.FlexBox: Item wrapper visibility synchronization corrected
sap.m.GenericTile: Vertical alignment improved
sap.m.GrowingEnablement: Fix updateDiff handling for empty diffs
sap.m.IconTabBar:  Actual positions and size of the tabs are now read correctly
sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus is now clearly visible
sap.m.IconTabBar: Margin and Padding corrected according to new visual design.
sap.m.IconTabBar: Tabs info is now read correctly by JAWS
sap.m.Input: Difference in right padding on cozy/compact mode is corected.
sap.m.Input: Suggestions are now displaying correctly
sap.m.Input: Value help icon is now correct in rtl in Chrome
sap.m.Input: ValueStateMessage appearing above suggestion popup on select corrected
sap.m.InputBase: Hidden element that holds the placeholder value is of a correct type.
sap.m.Label: Dotes in sap.ui.layout.Form are positioned correctly
sap.m.Label: Label is rendered as span when used decorative
sap.m.Label: Label wrapping has been enabled outside of Form context
sap.m.Link: Enter key-press event handled
sap.m.MaskInput-on Firefox if the cursor is at the beginning of the field, left arrow does nothing.
sap.m.Menu: has focus now
sap.m.MenuItem - setting key does not throw an error anymore.
sap.m.MenuItem: Press event is now fired
sap.m.MessagePopover: Models should be forwarded to the internal MessageView
sap.m.MessageStrip: Prevents announcing the control information multiple times.
sap.m.MessageView: NavContainer should be a child of the MessageView
sap.m.MessageView: No initial navigation when there is only one item without description
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Content min width of the Dropdown is now set correcrly
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Placeholder left padding in IE fixed
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Prevent endless focus loop on mobile
sap.m.MultiInput: Do not tokenize text when ValueHelp is opened.
sap.m.MultiInput: Fixed setTokens() to remove all tokens
sap.m.MultiInput: Padding adjusted
sap.m.MultiInput: Revert changes on css
sap.m.MultiInput: suggestionItemSelected event is now fired only once
sap.m.NavContainer: Navigation now works correctly when the pages are destroyed during animation
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: correct different height of the ObjectAttributeDiv between IE and Chrome
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Margin and Padding corrected according to new visual design
sap.m.ObjectHeader: even if they are no statuses set, markers are rendered.
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: AriaLabelledBy correctly set on the active title
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Renders an invisible placeholder when it is empty
sap.m.Page: Footer got hidden unexpectedly fix
sap.m.Page: Wrapper tag around the toolbars are properly changed
sap.m.Page: properly show floatingFooter when PageAccessibleLandmark info is used
sap.m.Page: showHeader property working correctly with floatingFooter
sap.m.Panel: avoid showing duplicate icon focus outlines
sap.m.Panel: fix focus outline in IE
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - appointment row focus outline covers all 4 sides for High Contrast Black & High Contrast White themes.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: SpecialDates are destroyed correctly
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: direct navigation to date bugs fixed
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: selecting appointments fires event in OneMonth view on small screen size
sap.m.Popover: QUnit UI adaptation fixed
sap.m.RadioButton: Events should not be triggered if the button is not editable or enabled
sap.m.RadioButton: Fire select event with keyboard handling.
sap.m.RadioButton: Problem with the position of the dot when a browser is zoomed fixed
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: fire select event of RadioButton
sap.m.RangeSlider: Longer max values are breaking the layout
sap.m.RangeSlider: Tooltips are now properly swapped when range is reversed.
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Added ARIA attribute for displayOnly mode
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Adjust margins according to visual design
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Corrected margin for display only in compact mode
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Fix dencity mode for not rendered control
sap.m.SearchField: Suggestion field is now sized correctly
sap.m.SearchField: Unnecessary 'suggest' events are not fired any more
sap.m.SegmentedButton - when used inside sap.m.Bar spacing is preserved.
sap.m.SelectionDetails: Rendering improved
sap.m.SelectionDetailsItemLine: Rendering of date and time improved
sap.m.Slider/RangeSlider: Tooltips and labels direction should not change in rtl
sap.m.Slider: End labels are now rendered correctly in RTL
sap.m.Slider: Focus should not be called manually when tooltip's value is updated
sap.m.Slider: Make Examples page look good
sap.m.Slider: Make Examples page look good
sap.m.Slider: Tickmarks displayed correctly in dialog
sap.m.SplitContainer: Focus on items in master view is now correct
sap.m.StepInput: Add missing valueStateText property
sap.m.Table: Reset padding when there is no visible header.
sap.m.Text: maxLines property is now working
sap.m.TextArea: Adjust height on setValue()
sap.m.TextArea: _adjustHeight before control is rendered
sap.m.TextArea: fixed alignment in Form
sap.m.TileContainer: Moving of tiles fixed
sap.m.TileContainer: Render tiles on ScrollIntoView call
sap.m.TimePicker - AM/PM slider values for all languages are being read by Screen Reader
sap.m.Toolbar: remove bottom border when toolbar is page footer
sap.m.UploadCollection: Deletion handling corrected
sap.m.UploadCollection: Runtime error after item deletion in pending mode corrected
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fix navigation between customTabs
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: onCancel now do not modify filter selection
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: properly sets ariaLabeledBy to the Dialog instance
sap.m.ViewSettingsPopover - title is always propagated to dialog aria label.
sap.m.Wizard: Regression in discardProgress fixed
sap.m.Wizard: Scrolling to steps is not consistent
sap.m.WizardProgressNavigator: Navigation works now correctly on mobile
sap.m.delegate.ValueStateMessage: Value state text reading corrected
sap.m.library: Mising FlexWrap enumeration is now fixed.
sap.ui.fl Correctly mark change as being applied changeHandler for xml views
sap.ui.test - removed OPA phone test
